\usepackage{subcaption} 
\usepackage{longtable}
\usepackage{float}
\restylefloat{table}
\usepackage{caption, subcaption}
\usepackage{colortbl}




\input{docsetup.tex}

\begin{document}
\frontmatter
\pagenumbering{Roman}

%% PART 1
%%The title page will be automatically generated and added by the DAIM system
\input{dedication.tex}		%% Optional

%% PART 2
\input{abstract.tex}		%% Optional
\input{preface.tex}			%% Optional
\input{list.tex}			%% Generate TOC, list of tables, and list of figures automatically
\input{abbreviations.tex}	%% Optional

%% PART 3 -- The Chapters
\mainmatter
\input{introduction.tex}
\input{requirementspecification.tex}
\input{pre-study.tex}
\input{tools.tex}
\input{projectmanagement.tex}
\input{designandarchitecture.tex}
\input{implementation.tex}
\input{testing.tex}
\input{evaluation.tex}
\input{conclusion.tex}
%\input{bibliography.tex}


%% PART 4
\input{references.tex}	%% Edit your references in "mylib.bib"
\input{appendix.tex}		%% Optional

\end{document}
